EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Webinar: Is Independence Right For You in 2012? (1325256340.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Webinar: Is Independence Right For You in 2012? (1325256340.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: You too :) Steve -----Original Message----- From: Robert Becker [mailto:rbeckerchi@yahoo.com] Sent: Thursday, December 29, 2011 5:39 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners Webinar: Is Independence Right For You in 2012? Hi Steve: Have a Happy New Year!!! ------------------------------ On Thu, Dec 29, 2011 3:12 PM EST Steve Arhancet wrote: >Dear Robert, > >Along the way, you shared with us that you have considered independent consulting as a career path. We appreciate your interest in our company and the topic of independence. It's a subject we are passionate about. > >Each year, we observe a surge in interest around the topic just after the holidays from connections new and old. You may be interested in participating in our pre-New-Years Webinar: > >Title: Is Independent Consulting Right For You? > >Date/Time: Tomorrow, 12/30, at 12:30 PM EST > >Or just reading about our point of view in a recent posting we did. > >Steve >___________________________________ >Steve Arhancet >Director, Consultant Services >MBO Partners > >t: 703.793.6011 >f: 703.793.6081 >m: 540.560.8837 >e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com >w: www.mbopartners.com > >If you no longer wish to receive these emails, go to the following link to unsubscribe: http://info.mbopartners.com/EnterpriseUnsubscribePage.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons6rAZKXonjHpfsX56%2BUqX661lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4AT8JnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D. >
